request sent: A request haes been sent tae us for
approval notification: an ye will get an email if ye hae been approved
fbTitle: Fuid banks an ither crisis help
fbSubTitle1: Check if ye can increase yer income
fbPara1: If ye dinnae hae enough siller fur fuid, ye micht be able tae:
fbPara1list1: increase yer income - fur example, ye micht be able tae claim benefits. Check if ye can increase yer income.
fbPara1List2: get emergency help wi fuid - check if ye can get a crisis grant fae the Scots Welfare Fund.
fbPara2: If ye need help an advice, ye can:
fbPara2List1: speak tae an adviser at a Counsels tae Citizens Bureau - find oot how tae contact a Counsels tae Citizens Bureau
fbPara2List2: get advice fae the Money Talk Team at yer local bureau - caw 0800 028 1456 tae be directed tae yer local bureau or gang tae the Money Talk Team wabsteid.
fbPara3: An adviser can check that ye're gettin aw the siller an benefits that ye're entitled tae.
fbSubTitle2: Gettin help fae a fuid bank
fbPara4: Ye micht be able tae get emergency help wi fuid fae a fuid bank.
fbPara5List2: kirks - they'll still help ye even if ye're no religious or hae a different religion
fbPara6: Tae get help fae a fuid bank ye micht need tae be referred wi a voucher that ye can exchange fur fuid. The fuid bank will tell ye whaur ye can get a voucher in yer area.
fbPara7: Tae find a fuid bank, ye can:
fbPara7List1: check online tae see if there are ony local fuid banks ye can gang tae an if they will need ye tae hae a referral voucher or no
fbPara7List2: contact a Counsels tae Citizens Bureau - they can help ye find a local fuid bank an can also support ye tae get ither help
fbPara7List3: check the Independent Fuid Aid Network's wabsteid for information aboot independent fuid banks in yer area. Some o thae will need ye tae hae a referral voucher but ithers winnae
fbPara7List4: check the Trussell Trust‚Äôs wabsteid tae see if it runs a fuid bank near ye. The Trussell Trust is a charity that runs a network o fuid banks in the UK. Tae get fuid fae a Trussell Trust fuid bank, ye‚Äôll usually need a referral voucher. Ye can find oot whaur tae get a voucher on the fuid bank‚Äôs wabsteid
fbPara7List5: contact yer local cooncil an ask if there is a fuid bank near ye, an whit ither help micht be available, fur example fae the Scots Welfare Fund.
fbSubTitle4: If ye cannae get tae a fuid bank
fbPara8: If ye bide in a rural area an cannae get tae a fuid bank, yer nearest fuid bank micht be able tae deliver. Contact them tae check.
fbPara9: Find oot mair aboot ither help ye can get if ye're strugglin wi livin costs.
fbPara10: Find oot aboot ither help in yer area by askin:
fbPara10List1: yer local cooncil - find yer local cooncil on mygov.scot.
fbPara10List2: yer local Counsels tae Citizens Bureau.
